body.name: Oxford Baby Briella Crib to Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit, White, GreenGuard Gold Certified
body.stockDetail: Only 9 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 37 mins
features: SAFETY FIRST: Oxford Baby Nursery Furniture is made to the highest safety standards set by the CPSC and ASTM; Our furniture endures rigorous testing by 3rd party labs to guarantee compliance with U.S. and C.A. safety standards

COMPATIBILITY: This Crib to Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit is compatible with the Oxford Baby Briella 4-in-1 Convertible Crib (12611420) and should be used as your child becomes independent and transitions from crib, toddler bed, or daybed into a full-size bed

PREMIUM QUALITY & CRAFTSMANSHIP: Made from solid woods and wood veneers, this Crib to Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit is expertly crafted from solid and sustainably sourced wood providing quality construction creating a safer, sturdier sleep environment for your baby

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: GreenGuard Gold Certified products have undergone rigorous testing for over 10,000 chemical emissions, ensuring that this product is certified for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage

ASSEMBLED DIMENSIONS: Measuring 76.00 W x 2.00 in. D x 5.00 in. H (28.60 lbs.), this Crib to Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit arrives ready to convert and includes 2-side rails, 5-slats, and hardware for assembly; screwdriver not included but required to assemble
body.description: The Briella Crib to Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit will convert the Briella 4-in-1 Convertible Crib (12611420) into a full size bed with a headboard and a footboard. Each side rail is finished to match your crib. The Full Bed Conversion Kit comes with two coordinating side rails and five slat support pieces.This Oxford Baby Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit arrives ready to assemble and includes hardware for assembly. The Conversion Kit measures 76.00 in. W x 2.00 in. D x 5.00 in. H (28.60 lbs.) and can accommodate up to 400 pounds when converted to a full-size bed. Plus, this Crib to Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit is backed by a 1 Year Limited Manufacturer’s Warranty.The Oxford Baby Briella Crib to Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit has achieved GREENGUARD GOLD Certification. GREENGUARD GOLD Certified products are certified to GREENGUARD GOLD standards for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage.The Briella Collection by Oxford Baby in White features a 4-in-1 Convertible Crib (12611420), 3-Drawer Dresser (12633420), Changing Topper (12663420), Toddler Bed Guard Rail (12695420), Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit (12688420), and Oxford Baby Crib Mattress, sold separately. The Briella Collection is available in a charming white finish which complements many design and décor aesthetics.
